name: Squoia
body:
### Project SQUOIA
Resources and applications developed for the project [SQUOIA](http://www.cl.uzh.ch/research/maschinelleuebersetzung/hybridmt_en.html) ('Exploiting Parallel Treebanks for Hybrid Machine Translation') at the University of Zurich. 
Contains: 

* Code for hybrid MT-Systems Spanish-Cuzco Quechua and Spanish-German
* Bilingual dictionaries Spanish-Cuzco Quechua and Spanish-German in Apertium format
* Parallel treebanks in Spanish-German-Quechua, annotated with phrase structures (German and Spanish) and dependency trees (Quechua)
* xfst and foma sources for morphological analysis and spell-checking for Cuzco Quechua (spell checker plugins for LibreOffice/OpenOffice are available [here](https://github.com/hinantin/LibreOfficePlugin/releases))
* a pipeline for analysing and parsing Southern Quechua texts



### Authors and Contributors

* @ariosquoia
* @agoehring
* @richardcastro
